basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Munene Ndereba. I am an experienced Software Engineer with more than a decade of experience building complex systems banks, large companies and small enterprises. My language of choice is jBC on the Temenos T24 Platform and Java. I also have experience with JavaScript on NodeJS.

projects.title: Bank 2 Business Integration
projects.description: I delivered this integration project for a leading real estate company. This involved exposing an API to the bank to validate and post transactions to the client's SAP ERP System. I built the API using the JBoss RESTEasy library and deployed on Apache Tomcat 9.X.X
